game_description: Farming Tractor is a VR adventure game that lets players experience real-life driving and farming on farm. In addition to growing plants, feeding animals, and other farm activities, players can now enjoy two new categories: Modern Drone Farming and Risky Roads. In Modern Drone Farming, players can operate a flying drone to survey the farm area, sprinkle pest control, and even shoot wild animals. This new feature provides a realistic drone operating experience for players. In Risky Roads, players will face thrilling adventures as they navigate their tractor through risky off-road paths while completing various tasks. Furthermore, we have also added a new feature that lets players experience night farming. With the backdrop of a dark and stormy night, players can immerse themselves in the sound of chirping crickets and the occasional flash of lightning. As always, players can access a tutorial to better understand the game, and enjoy nature-themed music and unique graphics animations. Features: - Grow and harvest crops - Watering plants - Modern Farming irrigation - Scientific Drone Farming - Feed animals - Dark and stormy night in farm - Adventure on risky surrounding roads - Nature music in background - Unique and excellent graphics animations - Real tractor driving - Tutorial for understand game Join our community on Discord to stay updated on the latest news and events! review_1: If you want to do farming in VR this is the game for you. It has a few issues graphics are a bit flat, audio comes in and out, Settings dont save. Apart from that you have some fun tasks to do around the farm like drivingthe tractor, milking cows feeding chickens. Wish there was more of an option to decide what tasks you want to do rather then you cannot continue till one task is finished. Spent all the money on fuel for the tractor so not sure why it doesnt last. The characters feel flat and non responsive just walk straight through you and alot of the items inthe game just jump around and doesnt move like it should. With some updates this could be a great simulator but for now its just a bit of janky fun.
